column4: I'm sorry a newbie question.  Are there any differences with upgrading your ubuntu version through the update manager instead of a whole new installation from cd?  Any advantages to doing a fresh install?
for instance, if you upgrade 9.04->9.10 you wont get grub2, so yes, there will be differences.
but also realise that most people upgrade, so it's fully supported and a recommended wa yof doing things.
